nodes.text: Kol Iben was a gas giant located in a star system in the Outer Rim Territories' Arkanis sector. It had at least one moon, the estuary moon of Trask. The planet was situated in the Outer Rim Territories.

Kol Iben was first mentioned in "Chapter 10: The Passenger", a second season episode of Jon Favreau's live-action television series The Mandalorian, directed by Peyton Reed and released on November 6, 2020 on Disney+. It debuted in the following episode, "Chapter 11: The Heiress".
